body_text: I imagine this could be done once at top level, instead of beforeEach. I think that would make the tests very slightly faster, and simpler.
body: I imagine this could be done once at top level, instead of `beforeEach`. I think that would make the tests very slightly faster, and simpler.
body_html: I imagine this could be done once at top level, instead of beforeEach. I think that would make the tests very slightly faster, and simpler.
